name: FrogBery
description:
A tiny thief frog has stolen the power of the cosmic drawing. Now the world and its inhabitants are against him. Use the newly obtained power to avoid traps and enemies on your escape.

Features
  • Run, jump and draw objects using your mouse.
  • Use the blue power to create drawings that are affected by gravity.
  • Use the red power to create static drawings.
  • Collect fruits to replenish your power.
  • Face 6 different types of enemies and 3 types of traps.
Credits

Programming - Francesco Peruzzi, Luca Giacomini, Maria Antonietta Cafaro

Game Design - Federico Ronco, Marco Lomazzi, Mattia Podini

Game Assets - Pixel Frog
